<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Search Repositories</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/code/api/v1/repositories/search"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get a list with all the repositories of customer
Use filter params to search among the various repositories

## Request
